t: r/costarica on Reddit: Does anyone have any experience with ordering things from Amazon to Costa Rica? I know it costs a lot. I'm more interested in how long it takes etc. I appreciate any help.
s: January 14, 2025 - Hello, in this subreddit you can talk to a mix of Costa Ricans, foreign visitors and expats for a more varied experience and set of answers. Our country slogan is Pura Vida, which to make matters short is like Hakuna Matata, and also hello and goodbye. Our Spanish centered sub is r/Ticos Feel free to ask and share about your recent visit as well. Pura Vida! Community icon by u/el-cadejos ...
